plot: Follows the exploits of two rival gangs of Lemurs, dubbed the Furies and the Graveyard Gang, as they defend their respective territories in the protected reserve of Berenty in southeast Madagascar.
plot_en: Follows the exploits of two rival gangs of Lemurs, dubbed the Furies and the Graveyard Gang, as they defend their respective territories in the protected reserve of Berenty in southeast Madagascar.
plot_es: Follows the exploits of two rival gangs of Lemurs, dubbed the Furies and the Graveyard Gang, as they defend their respective territories in the protected reserve of Berenty in southeast Madagascar.
title: Lemur Kingdom
